```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(ggtern)
```

```{r ggtern-package, cache = TRUE}
##-----------------------------------------------
## Basic Usage
##-----------------------------------------------
df = data.frame(x = runif(50),
                y = runif(50),
                z = runif(50),
                Value = runif(50,1,10),
                Group = as.factor(round(runif(50,1,2))))
ggtern(data=df,aes(x,y,z,color=Group)) +
  theme_rgbw() +
  geom_point() + geom_path() +
  labs(x="X",y="Y",z="Z",title="Title")



```
